definition: burning hot/fiery/to have one's hair permed with hot curling tongs
fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86
to scald/to burn (by scalding)/to blanch (cooking)/to heat (sth) up in hot water/to perm/to iron/scalding hot

sentences.english: If not ventilated properly, their ballast circuitry can get fried enough to fail.

sentences.english: I feel the sincere love in my burny heart, which is hard to gain in this world.
sentences.chinese: 在我火燙的心中感受着真誠的愛，這世上難求的愛。

sentences.english: The fire burned his figure and he cried.
sentences.chinese: 火燙了他的手指頭，他哭了。

sentences.english: Perming one's hair is very harmful to the hair and can sometimes burn it.
